text: Before the Acts of Union 1707, the barons of the shire of Perth elected commissioners to represent them in the unicameral Parliament of Scotland and in the Convention of the Estates. The number of commissioners was increased from two to four in 1690. From 1708 Perthshire was represented by one Member of Parliament in the House of Commons of Great Britain. ==List of shire commissioners== *1617-?
